name: 2022 6th International Conference on Civil Engineering
content: Publication: Papers submitted to ICOCE 2022 will be peer reviewed by conference committees, and accepted papers of ICOCE 2022 will be published as a post-proceedings in Lecture Notes in Civil Engineering book series by Springer, and submitted for Scopus and EI Compendex databases for indexing. Some selected papers will be sent to be reviewed by the IJSCER editorial board, and accepted papers will be published in International Journal of Structural and Civil Engineering Research, which will be indexed by Google Scholar, ProQuest, etc.
